DOC.brief_summary: Saxagliptin is a new investigational medication being developed for treatment of type 2 diabetes. This study is designed to test the efficacy of once daily saxagliptin in renally impaired patients.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Effect of Saxagliptin Compared With Placebo in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes and Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with type 2 diabetes Documented history of CrCl <50 ml/min within the 3 months prior to enrollment HbA1c ≥7.0% and ≤11.0% Type 1 diabetes, history of diabetic ketoacidosis or hyposmolar nonketonic coma Previous or current treatment with any DPPIV inhibitor and/or GLP1 mimetic.
